sentences.sContent: Michael has influenced so many artists, some of whom are picking up on the grandeur and showmanship of his live performances.
sentences.sContent_eng: Michael has influenced so many artists, some of whom are picking up on the grandeur and showmanship of his live performances.
sentences.sCn: 迈克尔影响了众多艺术家，他们中的有些人在演出上的火爆与高超本领上正得自他的绝技。

words.tran: 玩杂耍的人；马戏团的老板；表演者
因特别精彩而被掌声打断的表演

trans.tranOther: skill at entertaining people and getting public attention
